metadata.name: Shell Execution via Rsync - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the "gcc" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/rsync')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -e ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sh 0<&2 1>&2')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('sh 1>&2 0<&2'))) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/dev/null')))

output.summary: Detects the use of the "gcc" utility to execute a shell. Such behavior may be associated with privilege escalation, unauthorized command execution, or to break out from restricted environments.
